explanation: The objects that may be involved in completing the task of cooling a lettuce slice and placing it on the counter to the left of the fridge are the Knife (for slicing the lettuce), Fork (for handling the lettuce slice), Plate (for placing the lettuce slice), Bowl or Pan (for chilling or cooling the lettuce slice), Mug (for holding water to cool the lettuce slice), and Lettuce (the main object of the task).
